[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:232091”]Never heard of a code like this.
That’s why when I made my source, I deleted all Safe Zone’s that I had from my v1 source and re coded them.
Its difficult to do it every time you update so I understand what your going through…[/quote]you inverted the nonwild to wild? so instead of everything being wild unless the void applies, everything is safe?

item.title: Safezone/Wildzone Help
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

ok lol i have all of brimhaven in a savezone but theres so many savezone parts its covering up my pkbox
…Let me explain clearer,
There are several safe zones in brimhaven that overlap and im not sure what their coords are so i can make my pkbox a wildy…
Is there a way to make a wildy zone in the MIDDLE of a safe zone?
Something like this maybe IDk?

[code] }

public boolean Wild() {
    if ((absX >= 2762 && absX <= 2767 && absY >= 2774 && absY <= 2767)
            || heightLevel == 1) {

        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }[/code]

Read full topic
